require 'autotest/redgreen'

module Autotest::Growl
def self.growl title, msg, img, pri=0, stick=""
system "growlnotify -n autotest â€“image #{img} -p #{pri} -m #{ msg.inspect} #{title} #{stick}"
end

Autotest.add_hook :ran_command do |autotest|
filtered = autotest.results.grep(/\d+\s.*examples?/)
output = filtered.empty? ? "" : filtered.last.slice(/(\d+)\s.*examples?,\s(\d+)\s.*failures?(?:,\s(\d+)\s.*pending)?/)
if output =~ /[1-9]\sfailures?/
	growl "Test Results", "#{output}", "/Users/jeremyhageman/Library/autotest/rails_fail.png"
elsif output =~ /pending/
	growl "Test Results", "#{output}", "/Users/jeremyhageman/Library/autotest/rails_pending.png"
else
	growl "Test Results", "#{output}", "/Users/jeremyhageman/Library/autotest/rails_ok.png"
end
end

end

Autotest.add_hook :initialize do |at|
%w{.svn .hg .git vendor}.each {|exception| at.add_exception(exception)}
end
